body: The art wasn't bad. The plot was written by junior high people.  Overall I'd rather have my blood sucked out by leeches.  whatever happened to solid stories with great art?  That's all I ask. Agreed @COOLAsh  You do not need Lovecraftian Hentai!

Theres only 1 rape chapter left, or rather blackmail-esque, but thats not til damn near the end
The rest are pretty vanilla n chill
I thought the story will continue with the foreign paicchu addict.

I'm maybe tired but still I somehow agree with our all  time tsundere Iexpectedbetter these chs are getting extreme one after another well yeah arts good but still I'll say it again great HENTAI don't NEED too EXTREME PLOTS ....
Next chapter is gonna be interesting, but the main course doesn't start until after that one. I feel like a kid waiting for Christmas morning to arrive.
